channel.title: Quick Question
channel.description:
Need the code to make it so that when you go to switch mage spellbooks you have to have no weapon wielded to prevent setting autocast with ancient and switching to normal spells for tb.....
Thank You

item.title: Quick Question
item.dc:creator: @IKamra IKamra
item.description:
@IKamra wrote:

Thank you I can modify it further as needed but thank you for putting me in right direction

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Question
item.dc:creator: @wavemaker wavemaker
item.description:
@wavemaker wrote:

Well what you can do is get your simple “switch” command and than make it return when the item contains something. Here is an example:

if (keyword.equals("switch") { int spellbookID = Integer.parseInt(args[0]); if (isWearing.contains("staff") return; switch(spellbookID) { case 0: //change spellbook here c.getActionSender().sendSidebarInterface(id, interface); break; case 1: //change spellbook here break; } }
Note: That, the code above is an example.

Read full topic
